messages.title: Dear Neighbour,
messages.content: Over the last two years, we have been making positive and steady progress as a community; investing in local health services like Thornbury Hospital, securing £500,000 to kick start junction 18a into the M4, delivering superfast broadband to over 7,300 premises, locally and fiercely fighting off unsustainable development. However, that progress is at risk.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in local health services like Thornbury Hospital.
Securing £500,000 to kick start junction 18a into the M4, delivering superfast broadband to over 7,300 premises.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There has never been a Conservative majority Government without a Conservative MP here. A loss of just six seats and the Government loses its majority.

issues.governance: Having a Conservative MP here means we have real and proven influence in government to get the best deal for our area.
issues.health: Investing in local health services like Thornbury Hospital.

images.caption: LUKE HALL Parliamentary Candidate For South Gloucestershire

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet discusses the risk of losing progress made in the community if there isn't a Conservative majority, including potential consequences such as Jeremy Corbyn being imposed as Prime Minister and Nicola Sturgeon demanding tax rises in return for their support.
